name: Banana and Peanut Butter Dog Treats
author: Ali Q.
summary: While the title says dog treats, these treats can also double as a cake decoration or just human treats. I always have to fight off my younger siblings while making them or else there would be no dough left!
ingredients: 2 medium (7" to 7-7/8" long)s ripe bananas, mashed
1 cup all-purpose flour, or more if needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil
Place mashed bananas in a bowl
Add peanut butter and flour and mix until thoroughly combined
If dough feels too sticky to handle, mix in more flour; do not exceed 2 tablespoons
Scoop a small amount of dough and place onto a lightly floured surface
Roll dough to an even thickness of your preference, rotating after each roll and adding flour as needed to avoid sticking
Dust cookie cutters lightly in flour
Cut dough into desired shapes and transfer to the prepared cookie sheet
Bake in batches in the preheated oven until golden brown and firm, 15 to 20 minutes
Cool on the baking sheet for 1 minute before removing to a wire rack to cool completely
